SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.javafx

Interface FxResourcesLoader

All Known Implementing Classes:
FxCachingResourcesLoader
interface FxResourcesLoader
An implementation of this interface is in charge of loading the requested resources from within the jar itself.

Implementations of this might employ caching strategies in order to speed up loading.

An instance of this can be injected using NamedArg with a value of NAMED_ARG_NAME

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    NAMED_ARG_NAME
    Value to use as NamedArg.value() in order to request the instance of the current FxResourcesLoader as a constructor param

  • Method Details

    • loadImage

      javafx.scene.image.Image loadImage(String path)
      Loads an image from the given path
      Parameters:
      path - path to load from, as accepted by FxResources
      Returns:
      image loaded from the given path

    • loadCroppedImage

      javafx.scene.image.Image loadCroppedImage(String path, int x, int y, int width, int height)
      Loads an image from the given path and crops it to the requested coords
      Parameters:
      path - path to load from, as accepted by FxResources
      x - the X coordinate of the upper left corner of the region to read from the original image
      y - the Y coordinate of the upper left corner of the region to read from the original image
      width - the width of the region to be read from the original image
      height - the height of the region to be read from the original image
      Returns:
      image loaded from the given path, cropped as requested

    • getFxmlLoader

      javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader getFxmlLoader(String path)
      Creates a new FXMLLoader to load a fxml file from the given path
      Parameters:
      path - path to load from, as accepted by FxResources
      Returns:
      loader which loads from the given path
